title: Karnataka: Students wearing hijab denied entry in another college, principal says ‘following govt orders’ - The Indian Express
content:
1. Karnataka: Students wearing hijab denied entry in another college, principal says ‘following govt orders’  The Indian Express
  2. On Camera, Karnataka College Students' 'Allow Us In With Hijab' Plea  NDTV
  3. Hijab Vs Saffron Shawl Protest Erupt In Karnataka After College Denies Entry To Girls In Hijabs  India Today
  4. Hijab row: Uniform is the ruse, uniformity is the agenda  Deccan Herald
  5. Video: Students Stopped At Second Karnataka College Over Hijab  NDTV
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The incident involving the 25 students took place at the Kundapur government pre-university college in Udupi district where Hindu students on Wednesday came to college wearing saffron towels objecting to Muslim students wearing hijab.
